fields.Title of Presentation: <span><span style="font-size:11pt;background-color:transparent;">Allies for abundance: Uniting for a linguistically inclusive placement process</span></span>
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Conference on College Composition and Communication
fields.Sponsoring Organization: National Council of Teachers of English
fields.Description/Abstract: <span style="font-weight:400;">The presenters will describe the process of creating shared responsibility for a single first-year writing (FYW) placement process that accounts for linguistic diversity. They will recount their cross-campus efforts to identify students who need English language support, as well as strategies for the data collection and coalition-building necessary for guiding students to appropriate FYW courses. </span>
